alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 1:46PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Graham and central Greenlee Counties through 230 PM MST... At 146 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northwest of Morenci, or 19 miles northwest of Clifton, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clifton, Morenci and Fort Thomas. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 306 and 311. Route 191 near mile marker 135, and between mile markers 164 and 195. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
